name: BMX Daredevil Race: Extreme MTB stunt game pumped with tricks FREE
name_original: BMX Daredevil Race: Extreme MTB stunt game pumped with tricks FREE
description:
YES! The most awesome totally insane BMX Stunt Crashes ever! If you love sick tricks, big stunts and totally gnarly crashes then BMX Daredevil Racing is the game for you.

Get ready for an intense adventure into the world of true punk BMX stunt riding. When you can’t go ripping through the city doing your favorite tricks and stunts then just pull out BMX Daredevil Racing to get your trick fix. Use your headphones to have the true skater experience with intense custom punk music and sound effects perfectly produced specifically for this awesome bmx experience.

Features:
- 3 FREE Amazing different Stages
- 10 FREE Awesome Levels For Each Stage
- Insane Huge Air 360 Spin Combos
- Amazing Graffiti Style Graphics
- True Punk Music and Sound Effects
- Easy To Use and Extremely Fun Controls
- Share With Your Friends To See Who’s The Best
- Gamecenter Enabled With Leaderboards
- Perfect For Quick Games or Hours of BMX Stunt Crash Racing Fun

BMX Daredevil Race … the next evolution in the true BMX experience.
